      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Ion exchange chromatography: steps 1 to 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ionenaustauschchromatographie: Jobsteps 1 
bis 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Par échange ionique de chromatographie : 
étapes 1 à 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chromatography de troca de íon: etapas 1 a
3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cromatografia di scambio ionico: punti 1 - 
3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρωματογραφία ιονικής ανταλλαγής: βήματα 1 έως 
3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cromatografía de intercambio de ion: pasos 
de progresión 1 a 3</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations demonstrates the processes involved in an ion exchange column used for the detection of non-metals in water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbonate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorine</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">detection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">granules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ion exchange chromatography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ion exchange column</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ion exchange resin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen demonstriert die 
Prozesse, die in eine Ionenaustauschspalte mit einbezogen werden, die 
für die Abfragung der Nichtmetalle im Wasser benutzt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations démontre les 
processus impliqués dans une colonne d'échange ionique utilisée 
pour la détection des non-métaux dans l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações demonstra os 
processos envolvidos em uma coluna da troca de íon usada para a 
deteção dos não-metais na água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni dimostra i 
processi addetti ad una colonna di scambio ionico usata per la 
rilevazione dei metalloidi in acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων καταδεικνύει τις διαδικασίες 
που περιλαμβάνονται σε μια στήλη ιονικής ανταλλαγής που 
χρησιμοποιείται για την ανίχνευση των αμέταλλων στο ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones demuestra los 
procesos implicados en una columna del intercambio de ion usada para 
la detección de no metales en agua.</string>
          </description>
